snippet: When in France, lamb inspired thoughts of chili. When making chili, lamb inspired thoughts of France.
abstract: When in France, lamb inspired thoughts of chili. When making chili, lamb inspired thoughts of France.
lead_paragraph: A chili made with ground lamb and white beans is the subject of this week's A Good Appetite recipe. As I write in the column, the idea to combine lamb and white beans is classically French. When I was living in Paris as a college student, I ate it almost weekly, as a Sunday supper: a rosemary-flecked roasted leg of lamb served with a plate of softly stewed white beans scented with garlic.

headline.main: Lamb and Beans, a Great Pair in Any Language
